== Manimala (628205) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Manimala is a village in the [[Kanjirappally]] taluka of [[Kottayam]] district with an area of 3742 hectares and harbouring 5124 households with total population of 21053 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kottayam]] is at a distance of 40 km. Male population is 10213 and female population is 10840. Scheduled Caste Population is 4697 and Scheduled Tribes population is 239. Census Location Code of the village is 628205<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 18409 (87.44%)
* Literate male population: 8890 (87.05%)
* Literate female population: 9519 (87.81%)
